title: What are the major products that Florida produces? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you checked out our license plate(s) recently? They show one of the largest industries here in Florida.  That’s right. We’ve got oranges. In fact, Florida is the second largest citrus producer in the WORLD, right after Brazil. That nice, refreshing cup of orange juice you drink with breakfast? Most likely made with Floridian oranges. Companies such as Tropicana, Minute Maid, Simply Orange, and Florida’s Natural all use oranges grown in Florida. Along with amazing oranges, our other industries/products are as follows: The aerospace industry is the top manufacturing industry and largest employer in Florida. It is followed by medical equipment and supplies, printing and publishing sectors, semiconductor and electronic components and electronic instruments. Piper Aircraft, one of the global icons in aircraft manufacturing, operates in Vero Beach, Florida. It manufactures Beechcraft and Cessna planes. The hand-assembled Tibor Wheels, the favorite fly-fishing reel of former President Bush, is made in Florida. What are some major products that are made in Florida? Florida is also home to the “only certified organic sugar cultivated in the United States” So the next time you drink a glass of orange juice, be sure to think of Florida!

Like User-11152828104796058844 and Dana Groulx mentioned, Florida has a reputation for citrus, tomatoes, and tourism but those aren’t the only products of the state!  Agriculture According to NetState, Florida’s top agricultural products are oranges, sugarcane, tomatoes, cattle, and calves. Hello Tropicana! Manufacturing Given it’s abundance of agriculture, Florida is home to a number of fruit processing industries. Citrus fruit processing leads the way, but there’s also a pretty large industry for supplying, jellies, marmalades, and frozen veggies. And let’s not forget about flying things industry. Florida is home to some of the most notable aviation and aerospace companies in the country.  Mining Florida provides about 4/5’s of the United States phosphate rock for fertilizer. It also is home to a sizable oil industry. There’s a lot more to be said, but these are some of the main products. Here’s a list of 10 notable brands from Florida.
